name: ABANDONED DUNGEONS [UDC JAM #20]
description:
ABANDONED DUNGEONS - [GAME FOR UDC GAME JAM #20]

Ahoy Comrades! Here you are a rly cool game.

THERE'S A DOWNLOADABLE GAME BELOW IF THE BROWSER VERSION DOESNT WORK!

> GAME STORY <

One night you wake up in unfamiliar dungeons filled with darkness. Where am i?!! Where is the exit?? Can you find it by going through the catacombs? Is there a way out from here? Better to hurry up. In the distance you can hear some people, I even saw one but he didn't look very friendly.

Try to escape the endless maze by avoiding cameras, monsters and other traps hidden in these dark corridors!

Have fun playing!

ALL SOUNDTRACKS FROM THE GAME:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL-gGMa2SsfJeE-Y9vTSb25ANSJ3jUv6xl
